title: The Writer's Almanac - Sunday, April 26, 2020
description: It’s the birthday of novelist and screenwriter Anita Loos (1889), who wrote approximately 150 screenplays for silent films between 1913 and 1928.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It’s the birthday of novelist and screenwriter Anita Loos (1889), who wrote approximately 150 screenplays for silent films between 1913 and 1928.
